DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : BANKING & FINANCE
DOC.TEXT: Yields Rise on Two-Year Treasury_Notes : Yields on the notes rose in auction to their highest level in nearly three years.The high yield was 6.04 % , up from 5.94 % at the last auction May 24 . It was the highest rate since two-year notes sold for 6.14 % on Sept . 30 , 1991 . The notes will carry a coupon interest_rate of 6 % , with each $ 10 # 000 in face_value selling for $ 9 # 992.60. A total of $ 17.01 billion in notes were sold_out of bids totaling $ 44.9 billion .
